title: TensorFlow Lite for Android (Coding TensorFlow)
excerpt: In this episode of Coding TensorFlow, Laurence Moroney, Developer Advocate for TensorFlow at Google, talks us through how TensorFlow Lite works on Android. You'll see how to deploy a trained model to an Android App, and how you can run inference with it in Java.  “Building TensorFlow on Android” article
